item.description: Some time ago, I’ve worked on an oil sac (energy reservoir) detection in copepods (kind of zooplankton) for UniversitÃ© Laval. Apart from presenting the results on the ML4Plankton conference I’ve published a detailed blog post on the Appsilon blog that I strongly encourage you to read!

item.title: Presentation at ML4Plankton Conference ğŸŒŠğŸŸ
item.description: Recently I was working at work on detecting the oil sac in copepods. This is was a super cool problem in which we received data from professor FrÃ©dÃ©ric Maps from UniversitÃ© Laval. We together gave a talk on conference ML4Plankton that you can watch online! First Frederic gives some context on why this problem is important and later I explain methods used and problems you can find. Our talk is available online here:
